greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=1 iff binary weight of n-th prime is odd.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (MAGMA) [IsOdd(&+Intseq(NthPrime(n),2)) select 1 else 0: n in [1..100]];  // Bruno Berselli, Nov 16 2011
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 15 2011
